SELECT a.refund_complete_director_no as refundCompleteDirectorNo, a.refund_complete_date as refundCompleteDate, b.refund_sum as refundSum, c.member_id as memberId, c.member_name as memberName, d.refund_approval_date as refundApprovalDate FROM refund_complete a INNER JOIN refund b ON a.refund_no = b.refund_no INNER JOIN member c ON b.member_no = c.member_no INNER JOIN refund_approval_result d ON a.refund_no = d.refund_no ORDER BY refund_complete_date DESC
